links.title: The Internet of Money
links.description: The Internet of Money delves into the why of bitcoin.

links.title: Digital Gold
links.description: Bitcoin and the inside story of the misfits and millionaires trying to reinvent money.

links.description: A collection of talks is the spectacular sequel to the cult classic and best seller The Internet of Money.

links.title: Mastering Bitcoin: Programming the Open Blockchain
links.description: A guide through the seemingly complex world of bitcoin, providing the knowledge you need to participate in the internet of money.
